pullrequest.title: [gz11] Add missing component to error message

content.raw:
Thanks, works perfectly. Merged into this PR. I didn't see `ign_list_to_string` used anywhere, so I wasn't sure whether it would be ok to add a delimiter... I'm ok with this change if you are.

This is the new output:

~~~
-- BUILD ERRORS: These must be resolved before compiling.
--      Missing: ignition-physics1 (Components: sdf, dartsim, dartsim-plugin)
-- END BUILD ERRORS
~~~
content.html:
Thanks, works perfectly. Merged into this PR. I didn't see ign_list_to_string used anywhere, so I wasn't sure whether it would be ok to add a delimiter... I'm ok with this change if you are.

This is the new output:

--      Missing: ignition-physics1 (Components: sdf, dartsim, dartsim-plugin)
